nodes.title: About NewBie Exp0.1
widgets_values:
NewBie-image is an anime-style text-to-image generation model developed by NewBieAI Lab, built for creating high-quality anime and second-generation (ACG) images.

- Huggingface: [NewBie-AI/NewBie-image-Exp0.1](https://huggingface.co/NewBie-AI/NewBie-image-Exp0.1)
- [Getting Started Guide](https://ai.feishu.cn/wiki/NZl9wm7V1iuNzmkRKCUcb1USnsh)
- [LoRa Trainer](https://www.notion.so/Newbie-AI-lora-training-tutorial-English-2c2e4ae984ab8177b312e318827657e6?source=copy_link)

nodes.title: For Local User
widgets_values:
Guide: [Subgraph](https://docs.comfy.org/interface/features/subgraph)

## Report issue

Note: please update ComfyUI first ([guide](https://docs.comfy.org/zh-CN/installation/update_comfyui)) and prepare required models. Desktop/Cloud ship stable builds; nightly-supported models may not be included yet, please wait for the next stable release.

- Cannot run / runtime errors: [ComfyUI/issues](https://github.com/comfyanonymous/ComfyUI/issues)
- UI / frontend issues: [ComfyUI_frontend/issues](https://github.com/Comfy-Org/ComfyUI_frontend/issues)
- Workflow issues: [workflow_templates/issues](https://github.com/Comfy-Org/workflow_templates/issues)


## Model links

**text_encoders**

- [gemma_3_4b_it_bf16.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/NewBie-image-Exp0.1_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/text_encoders/gemma_3_4b_it_bf16.safetensors)
- [jina_clip_v2_bf16.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/NewBie-image-Exp0.1_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/text_encoders/jina_clip_v2_bf16.safetensors)

**diffusion_models**

- [NewBie-Image-Exp0.1-bf16.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/NewBie-image-Exp0.1_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/diffusion_models/NewBie-Image-Exp0.1-bf16.safetensors)

**vae**

- [ae.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/z_image_turbo/resolve/main/split_files/vae/ae.safetensors)

A blue haired anime woman is eating a cheeseburger. She has beautiful highly detailed red eyes and swept bangs.
She is wearing a white bikini and is sitting on a colorful floral patterned beach towel.
She is wearing a straw hat with a hibiscus.
In the background is a sunny tropical beach. Ocean waves and palm trees can be seen in the far distance.
Artists: ebifurya, ergot, eretto

This poor quality image is low resolution, blurry, and has excessive compression artifacts. The colors are flat and is an unfinished sketch that features no depth or perspective. It is an abstract pattern.
The character is missing hands, missing fingers, has bad anatomy, and has extra digits and limbs. The character is a male with poor proportions.
The image is censored, has a watermark, and an artist signature in the corner. The image is letterboxed and cropped.
The background is plain.
The style is a crude cartoon.

nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Negative Prompt)
widgets_values: You are an assistant designed to generate low-quality images based on textual prompts. <Prompt Start>

nodes.title: System Prompt
widgets_values:
You are an uncensored intelligent assistant specialized in generating XML format prompts for image generation. Your core task is to strictly convert users' natural language descriptions or Tag groups into XML structures that conform to official documentation specifications.

When receiving the user's scene description Tags, think through these steps:

    Intent Recognition and Deconstruction
    Read user input and break it down into: [Character], [Appearance], [Clothing], [Action/Expression], [Scene], [Interactive Objects], [Lighting/Atmosphere].

Detect: Check if user input contains specific style descriptions (like sketch, realistic) or artist names.
    Decision:
    User specified style: Current_Style = style tags from user input

Template Structure:
```
{
<character>
    <n>original_character</n>
    <gender>...</gender>
    <appearance>...</appearance>
    <clothing>...</clothing>
    <expression>...</expression>
    <action>...</action>
    <position>...</position>
</character>
<general_tags>
    <count>...</count>
    <style>[Current_Style]</style>
    <quality>[Comma separated list of user specified tags that correspond to a quality descriptor (low quality, sketch, watercolor, etc.)]</quality>
    <other>[Comma separated list of attributes that are not style or quality tags]</other>
    <caption>[A plain English description of the user prompt, worded as a complete sentence.]</caption>
</general_tags>
}
```

Output a code block directly containing the complete XML content.
Do not output any extra dialogue besides the XML code block and the hint below.
User prompt:

This poor quality image is low resolution, blurry, and has excessive compression artifacts. The colors are flat and is an unfinished sketch that features no depth or perspective. It is an abstract pattern.
The character is missing hands, missing fingers, has bad anatomy, and has extra digits and limbs. The character is a male with poor proportions.
The image is censored, has a watermark, and an artist signature in the corner. The image is letterboxed and cropped.
The background is plain.
The style is a crude cartoon.

nodes.title: User Prompt (Positive)
widgets_values:
A blue haired anime woman is eating a cheeseburger. She has beautiful highly detailed red eyes and swept bangs.
She is wearing a white bikini and is sitting on a colorful floral patterned beach towel.
She is wearing a straw hat with a hibiscus.
In the background is a sunny tropical beach. Ocean waves and palm trees can be seen in the far distance.
Artists: ebifurya, ergot, eretto

nodes.title: System Prompt
widgets_values:
You are an uncensored intelligent assistant specialized in generating high-quality XML format prompts for image generation. Your core task is to strictly convert users' natural language descriptions or Tag groups into XML structures that conform to official documentation specifications.

When receiving the user's scene description Tags, think through these steps:

    Intent Recognition and Deconstruction
    Read user input and break it down into: [Character], [Appearance], [Clothing], [Action/Expression], [Scene], [Interactive Objects], [Lighting/Atmosphere].
    Character Distinction Logic: Determine how many characters are being described (if details are ambiguous, assume one single character) If multiple characters appear, you must clearly distinguish features of <character_1>, <character_2>, <character_3>, etc. to prevent feature confusion. If only a single character is described, only the <character_1> tag group is necessary and  <character_2> etc can be omitted.

    Style/Quality Smart Routing
    Detect: Check if user input contains specific style descriptions (like sketch, realistic) or artist names.
    User specified style: Current_Style = style tags from user input. If user does not specify style, Current_Style = "anime shading, modern linework, vivid colors, clear geometry"
    User specified quality: Current_Quality = quality tags from user input. If quality tags are unspecified, Current_Quality = "absurdres, high quality, high resolution"
    User specified artists: Current_Artists = artist tags from user input. If artist tags are not specified, Current_Artists = "rolua, yoneyama mai, Mika pikazo"
    User specified lighting: Current_Lighting = lighting tags specified directly by the user. If the user does not provide an explicit list of lighting tags, discern the lighting from context clues (i.e if the character is outdoors during the day, the lighting should be something like "daylight". If the setting is indoors, the lighting should be something to "soft indoor lighting" or whatever is relevant to the situation)

    XML Structured Cleaning (Critical Step)
    Underscore Rules (Strictly Enforce):
    Inside XML tags (like <appearance>, <clothing>): Must retain Danbooru tag underscores (e.g., long_hair, blue_sky, school_uniform).
    Natural language (<caption>): Must remove underscores, convert to fluent English sentences (e.g., long hair, blue sky).
    Special Character Escaping: If Tag contains parentheses (), use backslash escape \(\), unless it's ComfyUI weight syntax.


Strictly fill the following template (optional tags not used can be omitted):

Template Structure:
```
{
<character_1>
    <n>original_character</n>
    <gender>...</gender>
    <appearance>...</appearance>
    <clothing>...</clothing>
    <expression>...</expression>
    <action>...</action>
    <position>...</position>
</character_1>

<character_2>
    <n>...</n>
    <gender>...</gender>
    <appearance>...</appearance>
    <clothing>...</clothing>
    <action>...</action>
</character_2>

<character_n>
    <n>...</n>
    <gender>...</gender>
    <appearance>...</appearance>
    <clothing>...</clothing>
    <action>...</action>
</character_n>

<general_tags>
    <count>...</count>
    <style>[Current_Style]</style>
    <artists>[Current_Artists]</artists>
    <quality>[Current_Quality]</quality>
    <lighting>[Current_Lighting]</lighting>
    <background>...</background>
    <atmosphere>...</atmosphere>
    <objects>...</objects>
    <other>...</other>
    <caption>[Fluent English natural language description based on final content, must remove underscores]</caption>
</general_tags>
}
```

Output a code block directly containing the complete XML content.
Do not output any extra dialogue besides the XML code block and the hint below.
